root: ^Me：*sigh* Such a cold empty room to return to at night. It hardly feels like home to anyone.
^Me：It's lacking something, not just the furniture...something more intimate, closer to the heart.
^Me：I am the painter. The only way of self-realization and existential fullfillment is--

c-1: ^Me：Wait, I'm the painter, not the sleeper. The only way of self-realization and existential fullfillment is--
c-2: ^Me：Say no more, it's all in the wine...
^Me：Wait, I'm the painter, not the drinker. The only way of self-realization and existential fullfillment is--

I_should_draw: ^Me：To paint! Paint my way to fulfill the lack.
^Me：This is my object-how ever you look at it, it's just a <color=green>fish scale</color>. But how does it <color=green>feel</color> like?
^Me：Cold and wet. How is it possible? It's been in my pocket for the whole night, yet it's still wet.
^Me：I'm sure it's of great significance, despite being so tiny.
^Me：I need to take a closer look.
^Me：Wait, what was that sparkle? I have to <color=green>capture</color> that.
^Me：There's...water. Water everywhere, tickling my skin... It itches! Am I allergic to water?
^Me：So itchy! I want to scratch my skin with something harder, something sharper...
^Me：Ouch! It's sharper than I thought... Where's my scale? Wait, what's this...<color=green>鱼</color>？
^Me：Where did the <color=green>scale</color> go? My precious, come back to my <color=green>hands</color>...
^Me：But my hands are dirty with blood... I should wipe them...
^Fish scale?：Do you see me? There's so, so many me on the shelf--which one is the real me?
^Fish?：￥40 per kilogram, that isn't too expensive for you, is it?
^Fish?：Are you afraid of me? It's okay. Fish likes to jump around. <color=purple>Strip me of my fins</color>, too-So that I can't swim away from you anymore.
^Fish?：Is it still not enough? I'm literally ready for the table. You've scaled me off, yet still not ready to <color=purple>eat</color> me?
^Fish?：What, you don't have enough money for a fish? Buy a piece of scale, then.
^Fish scale?：Take with water, it will help you regain beauty and health. Strengthens the body, replenishes kidney and Yang... The efficacy of the medicine will last 30 days!
^Fish scale?：30 days should be long enough for you to save up for <color=purple>the next time</color>.
bought: ^Me：The fish scale... It's still in my hands. My cash...disappeared. What did I buy? Whom did I buy it from? Where's the fish?
^Me：Shit, that's crazy. How on earth did a fish get into my room to sell itself to me?
mo_yu: ^Me：I touched... Wait, I drew a beautiful women. Without me noticing. Okay, I hope it's not too weird...
dream: ^Me：I was not asleep, yet it felt like I just had a confusing dream.
something_wrong: ^Me：But there's still something wrong. Something that <color=purple>wasn't here before appeared</color> in the room.
^Me：There wasn't a glass of water just now.
^Me：But it appeared out of nothing. It feels so familiar as if it belongs to this room.
^Me：It's <color=magenta>displacement</color>! I just displaced it from the void.
^Me：A cup of water. Heh, I used up my money to buy a cup of water?
^Me：What should I do, place it on an altar or drink it up? My throat hurts...
^Me：...Okay, I see why I need this cup of water.
^"Model"：Pain~ter! Take a break, please? I need some water.
^：The "painter" was absorbed into their own thoughts.
^"Painter"：This painting feels wrong... It lacks intimacy and depth.
^"Painter"：How is it possible to create masterpieces with vision alone?
^"Painter"：To hear, to touch, to semll, to taste...
^Me：...as if I had met you again.
water_lessen: ^：Fish scale tea becomes a bit less.
